moves.name: Psychic
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

passives.name: Head Start 6
passives.description: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by 6 the first time it enters a battle each battle.

passives.name: Safety Net
passives.description: Applies the Enduring effect to all allied sync pairs the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.

passives.name: Team Sync Regen
passives.description: Applies the Gradual Healing effect to all allied sync pairs after the user uses a sync move.
